SELECT /*[ClientDao.xml][selectClientList] 고객사 데이터들을 조회 */ BIZ_CD , CLIENT_CD , CLIENT_NM , BIZ_NO , BIZ_NM , CEO_NM , POST_NO , BASIC_ADDR , DETAIL_ADDR , DETAIL_ADDR , BIZ_TP , BIZ_KND , TEL_NO , FAX_NO , CONTACT_NM , CONTACT_TEL_NO , CONTACT_EMAIL , COUNTRY_CD , CITY_CD , USER_COL1 , USER_COL2 , USER_COL3 , USER_COL4 , USER_COL5 , REMARK , USE_YN , IN_DT , IN_USER_ID , UP_DT , UP_USER_ID FROM tb_ms_client WHERE 1=1
AND CLIENT_NM LIKE '%'#{codeCd}'%'

SELECT /*[BizDao.xml][select] 회사 데이터를 조회 */ ID , BIZ_CD , BIZ_NO , BIZ_NM , BIZ_SNM , CEO , ZIP , ADDR , DETAIL_ADDR , INDUTY , BIZ_CND , TEL , FAX , ETC_NO1 , ETC_NO2 , ETC_TP1 , ETC_TP2 , EXT_COL1 , EXT_COL2 , EXT_COL3 , EXT_COL4 , EXT_COL5 , USE_YN , IN_DT , IN_USER_ID , UP_DT , UP_USER_ID FROM tb_ms_biz WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT /*[BizDao.xml][selectMaxId] 회사 생성을 위한 ID 채번*/ MAX(ID) + 1 AS ID FROM tb_ms_biz
SELECT /*[BizDao.xml][selectBizCmb] 회사 데이터(코드, 명)을 이용해 콤보를 구성 */ BIZ_CD AS CODE , BIZ_NM AS NAME FROM tb_ms_biz
